1 Photo Modern Red White and Black Graduation Announcement

Hot Deals! 1 Photo Modern Red White and Black Graduation Announcement – Graduation Announcement Cards 1 Photo Modern Red White and Black Graduation Announcement Have a promotion during this period 1 Photo Modern Red White and Black Graduation Announcement quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryShare the joy of a high school or college graduation with these custom photo red, white and black announcements. (IMAGE PLACEMENT TIP: An easy way to center a picture exactly how you want is to crop it before uploading to the Zazzle website.) This template is simple to customize with any wording of your choice, such as party invitation details, parents’ names, special honors, degree title, favorite inspirational quote, graduate’s contact info, future education plans, or new job position. If there’s any text not wanted simply delete it. Design features a red ombre background, black mortar board cap, handwritten style script calligraphy, elegant modern typography, and one photo of your choice, such as a senior picture or image from the commencement ceremony. These elegant graduation announcement cards are a stylish way to share your special day celebration with family and friends. Congratulations to the graduate! Price:$2.34
